error.name: FIDO_ERROR_UNSUPPORTED_VERSION
error.msg: UAF message's version is not supported.

error.name: FIDO_ERROR_PROTOCOL_ERROR
error.msg: Protocol error, the interaction may have timed out, or the UAF message is malformed.

error.name: FIDO_ERROR_UNTRUSTED_FACET_ID
error.msg: The caller's id is not allowed to use this operation.
